resources.string: Like most great app ideas it started from a college dorm room. Where students were sitting around a set of speakers trying to prove themselves and compete to see who was the best. A test of cunning lyrics, lingusitic knowledge and a subtle yet innate sense of time and cultural humor brought the winner to victory. These were epic rap battles and sometimes the best mic is your phone.
A playlist of tracks and starting lines are continuously provided. Users rap in a freestyling fashion with unlimited time.
The user is given 30 seconds to come up with a 2 liner then passes the device. This round robin approach is to keep it tweet size, short and simple.
Options such as time, number of lines given and hints are all selectable giving the users greater control to a sandboxed rap battle.
This feature is in the development process and will be available with the premium version of the app released at a later date. Thank you for your patiences.

Written is the first line, Spoken comes next 
Keep the game going, it's your time to flex 


Swipe or Press Play!
